    A

    About - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer
    Class with sources for the different classes

    Creates new form About
    addNewFile(MyFile) - Method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.Main
    Adds a new MyFile item to the variable with local files Checks that the information on saved items is up to date.

    B

    btnLogInActionPerformed(ActionEvent) - Method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.LogIn
    Log in user by calling component and sending information on username and pwd textfields If a valid token is returned, and user has selected the corresponding checkbox, token is saved to metadata document If log in is successful, Download Panel is shown If not, message error is shown

    C

    canBeDownloaded() - Method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFile
    Checks if a file can be downloaded from a DB To do so, checks that file is not found on local machine and that it's not part of the DB
    canBeUploaded() - Method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFile
    Checks if a file can be uploaded to a DB To do so, checks that file is found on local machine and that it's not already on the DB

    M

    main(String[]) - Static method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.About
     
    main(String[]) - Static method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.Main
     
    Main - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer
    Class that manages the different views for our app It also includes any variable that has to be used across the different windows Objects from this main class will be instantiated on different views from our app to do so
    Main() - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.Main
    Constructor: Creates new form Main It first checks if there's any metadata saved Has a Panel with CardLayout and deals with initial view of subpanels Creation and methods for Logout and Exit Menu Items
    MediaPanel - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer
    Class that deals with the table with information related to media: local files, media on the cloud and items on both Implements filters, upload and download actions and a delete button
    MediaPanel(Main) - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.MediaPanel
    Constructor Initializes components Uses MigLayout Adds listener for the mimetype filters Refreshes model by checking local and database files
    MyFile - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer.models
    Class MyFile manages the information related to the files (local) and media (DB) generated after upload / download.
    MyFile() - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFile
    No params constructor
    MyFile(Media) - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFile
    Constructor for DB files
    MyFile(File, String) - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFile
    Constructor for local files
    MyFileTableModel - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer.models

    MyFileTableModel(ArrayList<MyFile>) - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.models.MyFileTableModel

    N

    newMediaAdded(NewMediaEventObject) - Method in class com.carbonell.melodyseer.MediaPanel

    P

    PreferencesPanel - Class in com.carbonell.melodyseer
    Class to set up different configurations: path for temporary files, path for yt-ldp.exe and download speed limit
    PreferencesPanel(Main) - Constructor for class com.carbonell.melodyseer.PreferencesPanel
    Creates new form PreferencesPanel Implements MigLayout for visualization
